original_text: Then straightway they departed from him which should have examined him: and the chief captain also was afraid, after he knew that he was a Roman, and because he had bound him.
korean_text: 심문하려던 사람들이 곧 그에게서 물러가고 천부장도 그가 로마 시민인 줄 알고 또 그 결박한 것 때문에 두려워하니라

sentences.original_text: Then straightway they departed from him
and the chief captain also was afraid
after he knew that he was a Roman
and because he had bound him
